product information:
The Canon PowerShot G9 is a compact powerhouse of a camera. 6x optical zoom and Canon optical image stabilization are packed in with superior, DIGIC III image processing. iSAPS Technology uses an internal database of thousands of photographs to calculate the best possible focus, exposure, and white-balance for taking that perfect shot. The Canon PowerShot G9 sports a large, 3 inch LCD screen that provides a wide angle look at your work and utilizes an anti-glare, anti-scratch coating to protect your hardware from accidental nicks and scratches.
